summary: This patch allows you to see faces of Falskaar guards through their helmets.
descriptionHtml:
Since this little mod is only a patch fortwo great mods, which are available for free, so [b]uploading this on SteamWorkshop is PROHIBITED[/b].

Updates
1.1
Updated for Improved Closefaced Helmets 1.11 (legendary edition)

Now the eye holes of Falskaar guards' helmets are open. Staalgard helmets are not affected beacuse of using their own assets.
This patch requires 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37994/?]Falskaar[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15927/? ]Improved Closefaced Helmets [/url]
Instead of .esp from Improved Closefaced Helmets you can use replacer .esp for the Legendary Edition from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093/?]Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade [/url]by kryptopyr
author: torr87
